body: ArrayIncludesIndexofAssembler and its TF_BUILTIN entries in builtins/builtins-array-gen.cc: Generate, GenerateSmiOrObject, GeneratePackedDoubles, GenerateHoleyDoubles; TF_BUILTIN ArrayIncludes, ArrayIncludesSmi, ArrayIncludesSmiOrObject, ArrayIncludesPackedDoubles, ArrayIncludesHoleyDoubles. Key preconditions/guards: BranchIfFastJSArrayForRead, LoadFastJSArrayLength, LoadElementsKind dispatch across PACKED_SMI, PACKED_ELEMENTS, PACKED_DOUBLE and HOLEY_*; fromIndex Smi/undefined checks; SameValueZero branches (NaN handling, +0/-0 via Float64Equal); treating TheHole as undefined in includes. SIMD external refs: array_indexof_includes_smi_or_object, array_indexof_includes_double. See builtins/builtins-array-gen.cc lines ~611-1300 for full details.
explanation: This record captures the core Array.prototype.includes fast-path implementation generated by Torque/CSA in builtins-array-gen.cc. It lists the important functions and guards that ensure fast-path applicability (fast JSArray, elements kind dispatch, fromIndex handling), and the variant-specific loops and SameValueZero handling including holes-as-undefined semantics.
